mapper.insert: insert into tb_board(boardNo, title, content, rating, insDate, uptDate, userNo, eventNo, bCategoryNo) values (GET_NO('tb_board'), #{title}, #{content}, #{rating}, #{insDate}, #{uptDate}, #{userNo}, #{eventNo}, #{bCategoryNo})
mapper.select: SELECT tb_b.boardNo, tb_b.title, tb_b.content, tb_b.rating, tb_b.insDate, tb_b.uptDate, tb_b.userNo, tb_b.eventNo, tb_bc.bCategoryNo AS 'bc_bCategoryNo', tb_bc.name AS 'bc_name' FROM tb_board tb_b INNER JOIN tb_boardCategory tb_bc ON tb_b.bCategoryNo = tb_bc.bCategoryNo WHERE tb_b.boardNo = #{boardNo};
